upload.title: Getting started
upload.text: Upload your list of products and we will search all the product information
upload.headline: Upload your file
upload.cta: Click to upload or drag and drop

howTo.title: How to upload your file?
howTo.text: We will explain in a short video how to get the information for your products

compatibility.text: Our product information is compatible with

ok.title: Hold on! Your download is being prepared
ok.text: The file will be ready soon. We will of course keep you informed via e-mail.

fail.text: Something went wrong uploading this file.
